originContent: ## Make sure to download the Latest Stable Release (LSR) and not the latest/LFR! Current LSR: 2.4.9
translatedContent: ## Make sure to download the Latest Stable Release (LSR) and not the latest/LFR! Current LSR: 2.4.9

originContent: **A ridiculously Pythonic and powerful framework for building beautiful desktop applications.**
translatedContent: **A ridiculously Pythonic and powerful framework for building beautiful desktop applications.**

originContent: WinUp is a modern UI framework for Python that wraps the power of PySide6 (Qt) in a simple, declarative, and developer-friendly API. It's designed to let you build applications faster, write cleaner code, and enjoy the development process.
translatedContent: WinUp is a modern UI framework for Python that wraps the power of PySide6 (Qt) in a simple, declarative, and developer-friendly API. It's designed to let you build applications faster, write cleaner code, and enjoy the development process.

originContent: WinUp now also supports building fully interactive, stateful web applications using the same Python-centric, component-based approach. The web module uses FastAPI and WebSockets under the hood to bring the simplicity of WinUp to the browser.
translatedContent: WinUp now also supports building fully interactive, stateful web applications using the same Python-centric, component-based approach. The web module uses FastAPI and WebSockets under the hood to bring the simplicity of WinUp to the browser.

originContent: > **Disclaimer:** Web support is an optional feature. To use it, you must install the web dependencies:
translatedContent: > **Disclaimer:** Web support is an optional feature. To use it, you must install the web dependencies:

originContent: ## Why WinUp? (Instead of raw PySide6 or Tkinter)
translatedContent: ## Why WinUp? (Instead of raw PySide6 or Tkinter)

originContent: Desktop development in Python can feel clunky. WinUp was built to fix that.
translatedContent: Desktop development in Python can feel clunky. WinUp was built to fix that.

originContent: | Feature                 | WinUp Way ‚ú®                                                                   | Raw PySide6 / Tkinter Way üòü                                                                |
translatedContent: | Feature                 | WinUp Way ‚ú®                                                                   | Raw PySide6 / Tkinter Way üòü                                                                |

originContent: | **Styling**             | `props={"background-color": "blue", "font-size": "16px"}`                      | Manual QSS strings, `widget.setStyleSheet(...)`, complex style objects.                     |
translatedContent: | **Styling**             | `props={"background-color": "blue", "font-size": "16px"}`                      | Manual QSS strings, `widget.setStyleSheet(...)`, complex style objects.                     |

originContent: | **State Management**    | `state.bind(widget, "prop", "key")`                                            | Manual callback functions, getters/setters, `StringVar()`, boilerplate everywhere.          |
translatedContent: | **State Management**    | `state.bind(widget, "prop", "key")`                                            | Manual callback functions, getters/setters, `StringVar()`, boilerplate everywhere.          |

originContent: | **Two-Way Binding**     | `state.bind_two_way(input_widget, "key")`                                      | Non-existent. Requires manual `on_change` handlers to update state and UI.                  |
translatedContent: | **Two-Way Binding**     | `state.bind_two_way(input_widget, "key")`                                      | Non-existent. Requires manual `on_change` handlers to update state and UI.                  |

originContent: | **Developer Tools**     | **Built-in Hot Reloading**, code profiler, and window tools out of the box.    | Non-existent. Restart the entire app for every single UI change.                            |
translatedContent: | **Developer Tools**     | **Built-in Hot Reloading**, code profiler, and window tools out of the box.    | Non-existent. Restart the entire app for every single UI change.                            |

originContent: | **Code Structure**      | Reusable, self-contained components with `@component`.                         | Often leads to large, monolithic classes or procedural scripts.                             |
translatedContent: | **Code Structure**      | Reusable, self-contained components with `@component`.                         | Often leads to large, monolithic classes or procedural scripts.                             |

originContent: **In short, WinUp provides the "killer features" of modern web frameworks (like React or Vue) for the desktop, saving you time and letting you focus on what matters: your application's logic.**
translatedContent: **In short, WinUp provides the "killer features" of modern web frameworks (like React or Vue) for the desktop, saving you time and letting you focus on what matters: your application's logic.**

originContent: | üåê Built-in Routing              | ‚úÖ Yes (`Router(routes={...})`)      | ‚ùå No built-in routing            |
translatedContent: | üåê Built-in Routing              | ‚úÖ Yes (`Router(routes={...})`)      | ‚ùå No built-in routing            |

originContent: | üé® Theming / Styling System     | ‚úÖ Global & Scoped themes             | ‚ùå Manual CSS injection           |
translatedContent: | üé® Theming / Styling System     | ‚úÖ Global & Scoped themes             | ‚ùå Manual CSS injection           |

originContent: | üî≤ Layout Options                | ‚úÖ Row, Column, Grid, Stack, Flexbox | ‚ö†Ô∏è Mostly Box & HBox/VBox         |
translatedContent: | üî≤ Layout Options                | ‚úÖ Row, Column, Grid, Stack, Flexbox | ‚ö†Ô∏è Mostly Box & HBox/VBox         |

originContent: | üéûÔ∏è Animations                   | ‚úÖ Built-in (fade, scale, etc.)      | ‚ùå None built-in                  |
translatedContent: | üéûÔ∏è Animations                   | ‚úÖ Built-in (fade, scale, etc.)      | ‚ùå None built-in                  |

originContent: | üîÅ Hot Reloading (LHR)          | ‚úÖ Stable + fast (`loadup dev`)      | ‚ö†Ô∏è Experimental, limited support  |
translatedContent: | üîÅ Hot Reloading (LHR)          | ‚úÖ Stable + fast (`loadup dev`)      | ‚ö†Ô∏è Experimental, limited support  |

originContent: | üì¶ Packaging                    | ‚úÖ With LoadUp (PyInstaller-based)   | ‚ùå Must integrate PyInstaller manually |
translatedContent: | üì¶ Packaging                    | ‚úÖ With LoadUp (PyInstaller-based)   | ‚ùå Must integrate PyInstaller manually |

originContent: | üõ† Developer Tooling            | ‚úÖ DevTools planned, Inspector soon  | ‚ùå None yet                       |
translatedContent: | üõ† Developer Tooling            | ‚úÖ DevTools planned, Inspector soon  | ‚ùå None yet                       |

originContent: | üì± Mobile Support               | ‚ùå Not yet                           | ‚ùå Not supported                  |
translatedContent: | üì± Mobile Support               | ‚ùå Not yet                           | ‚ùå Not supported                  |

originContent: | üß† Learning Curve               | ‚úÖ Easy for Python+React users       | ‚úÖ Easy but less tooling          |
translatedContent: | üß† Learning Curve               | ‚úÖ Easy for Python+React users       | ‚úÖ Easy but less tooling          |

originContent: *   **Declarative & Pythonic UI:** Build complex layouts with simple `Row` and `Column` objects instead of clunky box layouts.
translatedContent: *   **Declarative & Pythonic UI:** Build complex layouts with simple `Row` and `Column` objects instead of clunky box layouts.

originContent: *   **Component-Based Architecture:** Use the `@component` decorator to create modular and reusable UI widgets from simple functions.
translatedContent: *   **Component-Based Architecture:** Use the `@component` decorator to create modular and reusable UI widgets from simple functions.

originContent: *   **Powerful Styling System:** Style your widgets with simple Python dictionaries using `props`. Create global "CSS-like" classes with `style.add_style_dict`.
translatedContent: *   **Powerful Styling System:** Style your widgets with simple Python dictionaries using `props`. Create global "CSS-like" classes with `style.add_style_dict`.

originContent: *   **Full Application Shell:** Build professional applications with a declarative API for `MenuBar`, `ToolBar`, `StatusBar`, and `SystemTrayIcon`.
translatedContent: *   **Full Application Shell:** Build professional applications with a declarative API for `MenuBar`, `ToolBar`, `StatusBar`, and `SystemTrayIcon`.

originContent: *   **Asynchronous Task Runner:** Run long-running operations in the background without freezing your UI using the simple `@tasks.run` decorator.
translatedContent: *   **Asynchronous Task Runner:** Run long-running operations in the background without freezing your UI using the simple `@tasks.run` decorator.

originContent: *   **Performance by Default:** Includes an opt-in `@memo` decorator to cache component renders and prevent needless re-computation.
translatedContent: *   **Performance by Default:** Includes an opt-in `@memo` decorator to cache component renders and prevent needless re-computation.

originContent: *   **Widget Factory:** Replace any default widget with your own custom implementation (e.g., C++ based) using `ui.register_widget()`.
translatedContent: *   **Widget Factory:** Replace any default widget with your own custom implementation (e.g., C++ based) using `ui.register_widget()`.

originContent: *   **Multiple Windows:** Create and manage multiple independent windows for complex applications like tool palettes or music players.
translatedContent: *   **Multiple Windows:** Create and manage multiple independent windows for complex applications like tool palettes or music players.

originContent: *   **One-Way Binding:** Automatically update your UI when your data changes with `state.bind()`.
translatedContent: *   **One-Way Binding:** Automatically update your UI when your data changes with `state.bind()`.

originContent: *   **Two-Way Binding:** Effortlessly sync input widgets with your state using `state.bind_two_way()`.
translatedContent: *   **Two-Way Binding:** Effortlessly sync input widgets with your state using `state.bind_two_way()`.

originContent: *   **Subscriptions:** Trigger any function in response to state changes with `state.subscribe()`.
translatedContent: *   **Subscriptions:** Trigger any function in response to state changes with `state.subscribe()`.

originContent: *   **Hot Reloading:** See your UI changes instantly without restarting your app.
translatedContent: *   **Hot Reloading:** See your UI changes instantly without restarting your app.

originContent: *   **Profiler:** Easily measure the performance of any function with the `@profiler.measure()` decorator.
translatedContent: *   **Profiler:** Easily measure the performance of any function with the `@profiler.measure()` decorator.

originContent: *   **Window Tools:** Center, flash, or manage your application window with ease.
translatedContent: *   **Window Tools:** Center, flash, or manage your application window with ease.

originContent: *   **Built-in Routing:** Easily create multi-page applications with an intuitive, state-driven router.
translatedContent: *   **Built-in Routing:** Easily create multi-page applications with an intuitive, state-driven router.

originContent: *   **Flexible Data Layer:** Includes simple, consistent connectors for SQLite, PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, and Firebase.
translatedContent: *   **Flexible Data Layer:** Includes simple, consistent connectors for SQLite, PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, and Firebase.

originContent: Dive deeper into the features of WinUp:
translatedContent: Dive deeper into the features of WinUp:

originContent: WinUp is an open-source project. Contributions are welcome!
translatedContent: WinUp is an open-source project. Contributions are welcome!

translatedContent: This project is licensed under the MIT License. See **LICENSE** for more information.
